creator: paul_yerger

title: Thunderbird continually crashing and hanging up my computer
content:
When using Thunderbird, the program continually crashes and hangs up my computer.

I frequently use the task manger to try to stop the crash, but this only helps about 30% of the time. Usually I have to reboot.

I have a Surface Pro 8 with Windows 11. I have version 128.2.3esr (64-bit) installed, but this problem has continued through several versions.

This problem happens frequently when I click on the icons to write an e-mail, reply to an e-mail, or if I search for an e-mail. These are the three functions that cause this (as far as I know).

I removed all add-ons.

I cleared the cache.

I tried running Thunderbird in Trouble Shooting mode.

None of these things resolved the problem.

I would appreciate help/advice with this.

Sincerely,

David
creator: tindall1

title: Email on new google email account
content:
I have used thunderbird for 40 years. In September my email carrier went out of business. My old email address was momule@fidnet.com. MY new email address is momule1940@gmail.com. I need to get Thunderbird on my new email. I have already paid for additional security under my old email address. How do I get thunderbird for my new email and transfer the additional security to it? I have been searching google on how to accomplish this and it is as clear as mud. I am not technically savvy, therefore need human support. I do not have a record of a password for my account. Please call or email me with information in laymanâ€™s terms of how to make the transfer to my gmail. My phone number is 573-426-2456.

Thanks Barbara Kennedy
creator: momule1940
